---
title: MDS Conda Python Environment
---

```bash
conda install python=3.11 pandas jupyterlab jupyterlab-git jupyterlab-spellchecker
pip install otter-grader
```

```yaml
name: mds
channels:
  - conda-forge
dependencies:
  - conda
  - python=3.12
  - pandas
  - jupyterlab
  - jupyterlab-git
  - jupyterlab-spellchecker
  - pip:
    - otter-grader
```
